name: Dataset Creator
description: Built-in extension for creating new datasets with various data import methods and schema configuration

create-dataset-wizard.description: Interactive wizard for creating new datasets with schema definition

import-csv.description: Import dataset from CSV/TSV files with delimiter detection and type inference

import-database.description: Import dataset from relational databases with table selection and mapping

import-json.description: Import dataset from JSON files with automatic schema detection

schema-designer.description: Visual tool for designing and editing dataset schemas

autoDetectDelimiter.title: Auto-detect CSV Delimiter
autoDetectDelimiter.description: Automatically detect CSV delimiter (comma, semicolon, tab, pipe)

autoInferTypes.title: Auto-infer Column Types
autoInferTypes.description: Automatically detect column data types during import

maxPreviewRows.title: Max Preview Rows
maxPreviewRows.description: Maximum rows to preview during import

defaultEncoding.title: Default Encoding
defaultEncoding.description: Default character encoding for file imports

enableBulkImport.title: Enable Bulk Import
enableBulkImport.description: Allow importing multiple files at once

validateOnImport.title: Validate on Import
validateOnImport.description: Validate data against schema during import

Purpose: Provide comprehensive tools for creating new datasets with multiple import methods and schema configuration.

Implementation Plan:
1. Implement DatasetCreatorExtension class
2. Create CreateDatasetWizard component with step-by-step interface
3. Implement CSVImporter with delimiter detection and type inference
4. Implement JSONImporter with automatic schema detection
5. Implement DatabaseImporter with connection management
6. Create SchemaDesigner visual component
7. Implement data preview during import
8. Add import validation and error handling
9. Implement bulk import functionality
10. Add configuration management
11. Implement progress indication and cancellation
12. Add comprehensive logging and error messages

- BaseExtension (src/Extensions/SDK/BaseExtension.cs)
- IDatasetService
- IStorageService
- INotificationService
- ILoggingService
- ICachingService
- File system access for CSV/JSON imports
- Database connection libraries (NpgSql, MySql.Data, etc.)
